examples.description: creates a 'songs' property set to an empty array (artist has many songs)
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Artist: Artist #initialize creates a 'songs' property set to an empty array (artist has many songs)

examples.description: returns the artist's 'songs' collection (artist has many songs)
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Artist: Artist #songs returns the artist's 'songs' collection (artist has many songs)

examples.description: can be invoked with an optional second argument, an Artist object to be assigned to the song's 'artist' property (song belongs to artist)
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Artist: Song #initialize can be invoked with an optional second argument, an Artist object to be assigned to the song's 'artist' property (song belongs to artist)

examples.description: returns the artist of the song (song belongs to artist)
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Artist: Song #artist returns the artist of the song (song belongs to artist)

examples.description: assigns an artist to the song (song belongs to artist)
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Artist: Song #artist= assigns an artist to the song (song belongs to artist)

examples.description: assigns the current artist to the song's 'artist' property (song belongs to artist)
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Artist: Artist #add_song assigns the current artist to the song's 'artist' property (song belongs to artist)

examples.description: does not assign the artist if the song already has an artist
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Artist: Artist #add_song does not assign the artist if the song already has an artist

examples.description: adds the song to the current artist's 'songs' collection
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Artist: Artist #add_song adds the song to the current artist's 'songs' collection

examples.description: does not add the song to the current artist's collection of songs if it already exists therein
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Artist: Artist #add_song does not add the song to the current artist's collection of songs if it already exists therein

examples.description: invokes Artist#add_song to add itself to the artist's collection of songs (artist has many songs)
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Artist: Song #artist= invokes Artist#add_song to add itself to the artist's collection of songs (artist has many songs)

examples.description: invokes #artist= instead of simply assigning to an @artist instance variable to ensure that associations are created upon initialization
examples.full_description: Associations — Song and Artist: Song #initialize invokes #artist= instead of simply assigning to an @artist instance variable to ensure that associations are created upon initialization

examples.description: creates a 'songs' property set to an empty array (genre has many songs)

examples.description: can be invoked with an optional third argument, a Genre object to be assigned to the song's 'genre' property (song belongs to genre)

examples.description: adds the song to the genre's collection of songs (genre has many songs)

examples.description: does not add the song to the genre's collection of songs if it already exists therein

examples.description: invokes #genre= instead of simply assigning to a @genre instance variable to ensure that associations are created upon initialization

examples.description: returns a collection of genres for all of the artist's songs (artist has many genres through songs)
examples.full_description: Associations — Artist and Genre: Artist #genres returns a collection of genres for all of the artist's songs (artist has many genres through songs)

examples.description: does not return duplicate genres if the artist has more than one song of a particular genre (artist has many genres through songs)
examples.full_description: Associations — Artist and Genre: Artist #genres does not return duplicate genres if the artist has more than one song of a particular genre (artist has many genres through songs)

examples.description: collects genres through its songs instead of maintaining its own @genres instance variable (artist has many genres through songs)

examples.description: finds a song instance in @@all by the name property of the song

examples.description: returns (does not recreate) an existing song with the provided name if one exists in @@all
